english.segment1: Do you know who you're gonna be today. Do you know know what part your gonna play. When you stare into the mirror yeah. Empty eyes speak more words than I can say
english.segment2: Chorus. Is somethin missing in your life today. Somethin's missing, missing, missing somethin's. Is somethin missing ion your life today. Somethin's missing, missing, missing somethin's
english.segment3: You may say that all the world's a stage. Is the script for your role an empty page. Do your actions have a meaning yeah. Will they last, or will they quickly fade away
